casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert MCPHAIL No. 341P14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Isham F. Hicks, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Robert McPhail, for McPhail, Robert.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st of May 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Mecklenburg County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of May 2017 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of May 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
